name: Tvhguide
tagline: An Android client  for TVHeadend using the HTSP protocol
body:
TVHGuide is an Android client for [TVHeadend](https://www.lonelycoder.com/tvheadend), a TV streaming server. Some of its featrues are

* List channels and their upcoming events
* Search the EPG for future programmes
* Schedual, cancel and remove recordings
* Stream audio and video
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
